title: Dans le ventre du dragon (In the Belly of the Dragon) de Yves Si

This is a hidden gem of French-Canadian science-fiction. The story, even if a 
bit childish, is fun and thought provoking.

The reason I put it online is because it's available neither online or on DVD.
The only available copies are VHS tapes that you can find in video rental store basements.
